params.RcvrType: Receiver Type either Wholesaler(1) or Distributer(2)

methods.constructor: @dev Create new Medicine Batch by Manufacturer

getWDP().notice: @dev Get address Wholesaler, Distributer and Pharma

pickPackage(address).notice: @dev Pick Medicine Batch by Associate Transporter

receivedPackage(address).notice: @dev Received Medicine Batch by Associated Wholesaler or Distributer

recievedDP(address).notice: @dev Update Medicine Batch transaction Status(Recieved) in between Distributer and Pharma

recievedWD(address).notice: @dev Update Medicine Batch transaction Status(Recieved) in between Wholesaler and Distributer

sendDP(address,address).notice: @dev Update Medicine Batch transaction Status(Pick) in between Distributer and Pharma

sendWD(address,address).notice: @dev Update Medicine Batch transaction Status(Pick) in between Wholesaler and Distributer
